#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{   int n;
    cin>>n;
    while(n--)
    {   string a,b;
        int i,k=0,l;
        cin>>a>>b;
        l=a.length();
        for(i=0;i<l-1;++i)
        {   if(a[i]!=b[i]&&k==0)
                ++k;
            if(a[i+k]!=b[i])
            {   break;
            }
        }
        if(i==l-1)
            cout<<"1\n";
        else
            cout<<"0\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
